${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.NAME: Two Amounts, One Power
${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: At start of turn, gain !M! Strength and 1 Dexterity.

${ModID}:TemporaryPowerDemo.NAME: Auto-Generated Temporary Power
${ModID}:TemporaryPowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Scry this turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Card Parsing, Card Selection, Card Mods
${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.

${ModID}:InlineCardModDemo.NAME: Inline Card Mods
${ModID}:InlineCardModDemo.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Strike of any color to your hand. NL Enchant it with "Kills Spikers."

${ModID}:MultiPreviewDemoCard.NAME: Multiple Previews - One Card
${ModID}:MultiPreviewDemoCard.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a random *Stinky *Watcher *Buddy into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:MultiPreviewDemoCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a random Upgraded *Stinky *Watcher *Buddy into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain X Strength. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL Gain X+1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.NAME: Two Types of Damage
${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're Vulnerable, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:EarthDigging.NAME: Earth Digging
${ModID}:EarthDigging.DESCRIPTION: [#EFC851]Dig !M! : Basic rarity. NL ${ModID}:Removed : Add [#EFC851]Tomb [#EFC851]Digging to your deck.
${ModID}:EarthDigging.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#EFC851]Dig !M! : Basic rarity NL ${ModID}:Removed : Add [#EFC851]Tomb [#EFC851]Digging+ to your deck.

${ModID}:Worms.NAME: Worms
${ModID}:Worms.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This card can be Dug by any Dig effect.

${ModID}:Fury.NAME: Fury
${ModID}:Fury.DESCRIPTION: [#EFC851]Dig !M! : [#EFC851]Fury cards. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a copy of this card to your discard pile. NL ${ModID}:Dug : Increase [#EFC851]Fury cards' damage by 4

${ModID}:RightHook.NAME: Right Hook
${ModID}:RightHook.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Dug : Add *Left *Hook to your hand.

${ModID}:ShinyDrain.NAME: Shiny Drain
${ModID}:ShinyDrain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Gold equal to unblocked damage.

${ModID}:GoldenApple.NAME: GoldenApple
${ModID}:GoldenApple.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Max HP.

${ModID}:Entomb.NAME: Entomb
${ModID}:Entomb.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Chose a card to put at the bottom of your deck.

${ModID}:Yoyo.NAME: Yoyo
${ModID}:Yoyo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Diversion.NAME: Diversion
${ModID}:Diversion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card. NL ${ModID}:Drafted : Gain !M! Gold.

${ModID}:SearingMoney.NAME: Searing Money
${ModID}:SearingMoney.DESCRIPTION: [#EFC851]Dig !${ModID}:m2! : Costs Max HP. NL Gain !M! Golds. NL Add [#EFC851]Scorching [#EFC851]Hand and 2 [#EFC851]Burns into your draw pile.
${ModID}:SearingMoney.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#EFC851]Dig !${ModID}:m2! : Costs Max HP. NL Gain !M! Golds. NL Add [#EFC851]Scorching [#EFC851]Hand+ and 2 [#EFC851]Burns into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Daydream.NAME: Daydream
${ModID}:Daydream.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. NL Next turn, add !M! copy of that card into your hand. NL ${ModID}:Dug : costs 0 for the turn.
${ModID}:Daydream.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. NL Next turn, add !M! copies of that card into your hand. NL ${ModID}:Dug : costs 0 for the turn.

${ModID}:IntoxicantGas.NAME: Intoxicant Gas
${ModID}:IntoxicantGas.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Dug : Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ClingClang.NAME: Cling Clang
${ModID}:ClingClang.DESCRIPTION: [#EFC851]Dig !M! : Upgraded card. NL ${ModID}:Drafted : drop an additional card.
${ModID}:ClingClang.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#EFC851]Dig !M! : Upgraded card. NL ${ModID}:Drafted : drop an additional upgraded card.

${ModID}:FastRunningShoes.NAME: Fast Running Shoes
${ModID}:FastRunningShoes.DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn with !M! or less Block, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Starfish.NAME: Starfish
${ModID}:Starfish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust. NL ${ModID}:Dug : draw all [#EFC851]Starfish cards. NL ${ModID}:Drafted : Add another copy of this card to your deck.

${ModID}:Cooking.NAME: Cooking
${ModID}:Cooking.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Max HP. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Cooking.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X+1 Max HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ChocolateCoins.NAME: Chocolate Coins
${ModID}:ChocolateCoins.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Gold. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Max HP. Exhaust.

${ModID}:HuntingKnife.NAME: Hunting Knife
${ModID}:HuntingKnife.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal drop an additional card reward. NL Exhaust. NL ${ModID}:Drafted : Gain !M! Max HP.

${ModID}:Emergency.NAME: Emergency
${ModID}:Emergency.DESCRIPTION: [#EFC851]Dig !M! : Block. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Your next upgrade must be wasted on this card.

${ModID}:CallForHelp.NAME: Call For Help
${ModID}:CallForHelp.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to attack gain !B! Block. NL Otherwise gain as much next turn.

${ModID}:Pinata.NAME: Pi√±ata
${ModID}:Pinata.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain Gold equal to damage blocked this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DNAExtraction.NAME: DNA Extraction
${ModID}:DNAExtraction.DESCRIPTION: Take 1 damage. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Gain 5 Golds for each damaged target.

${ModID}:DivineStorm.NAME: Divine Storm
${ModID}:DivineStorm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:DevilsPact.NAME: Devil's Pact
${ModID}:DevilsPact.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card lose 1 Gold. NL ${ModID}:Drafted : Gain !M! Gold.

${ModID}:DomisdrawsSpear.NAME: Domisdraw's Spear
${ModID}:DomisdrawsSpear.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Drafted : add [#EFC851]Spear's [#EFC851]Shaky to your deck.

${ModID}:DomisdrawsBow.NAME: Domisdraw's Bow
${ModID}:DomisdrawsBow.DESCRIPTION: [#EFC851]Dig !M! : Rare rarity. NL Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Drafted : add [#EFC851]Bow's [#EFC851]Scorch to your deck.

${ModID}:DomisdrawsCross.NAME: Domisdraw's Cross
${ModID}:DomisdrawsCross.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of the first card you play each turn to your hand. NL ${ModID}:Drafted : add [#EFC851]Cross' [#EFC851]Disease to your deck.
${ModID}:DomisdrawsCross.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of the !M! first cards you play each turn to your hand. NL ${ModID}:Drafted : add [#EFC851]Cross' [#EFC851]Disease to your deck.

${ModID}:DomisdrawsCrossbow.NAME: Domisdraw's Crossbow
${ModID}:DomisdrawsCrossbow.DESCRIPTION: [#EFC851]Dig !M! : Rare rarity. NL Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.
${ModID}:DomisdrawsCrossbow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#EFC851]Dig !M! : Rare rarity. NL Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add !${ModID}:m2! copies of this card to your discard pile.

${ModID}:SpearsShake.NAME: Spear's Shake
${ModID}:SpearsShake.DESCRIPTION: Attack damage are halved while this card is in your hand. NL ${ModID}:Removed : remove [#EFC851]Domisdraw's [#EFC851]Spear from your deck.

${ModID}:BowsScorch.NAME: Bow's Scorch
${ModID}:BowsScorch.DESCRIPTION: This card can be ${ModID}:Dug by any ${ModID}:Dig effect. NL ${ModID}:Dug : Add a 2 Burns to your hand. NL ${ModID}:Removed : remove [#EFC851]Domisdraw's [#EFC851]Bow from your deck.

${ModID}:CrossDisease.NAME: Cross' Disease
${ModID}:CrossDisease.DESCRIPTION: When you draw this, Exhaust another random card in your hand. NL ${ModID}:Removed : remove [#EFC851]Domisdraw's [#EFC851]Spear from your deck.

${ModID}:LivingWeapon.NAME: Living Weapon
${ModID}:LivingWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Dug : Repeat the [#EFC851]Dig effect that ${ModID}:Dug this card.

${ModID}:WildRush.NAME: Wild Rush
${ModID}:WildRush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If Fatal gain 2 Max HP.

${ModID}:Antibody.NAME: Antibody
${ModID}:Antibody.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Max HP. NL Exhaust. NL ${ModID}:Drafted : Obtain a relic that makes you gain 1 Max HP after each combat. NL ${ModID}:Removed : Obtain it as well.

${ModID}:LearnYourBasics.NAME: Learn Your Basics
${ModID}:LearnYourBasics.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade ALL of your Basic cards for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:LearnYourBasics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Upgrade ALL of your Basic cards for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:VampireForm.NAME: Vampire Form
${ModID}:VampireForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Upgrade ALL of your Basic cards for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:ShadowDagger.NAME: Shadow Dagger
${ModID}:ShadowDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. When you enter a [#EFC851]? Room, permanently increase this card damage by !M!.

${ModID}:BornAgain.NAME: Born Again
${ModID}:BornAgain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Reset all ${ModID}:Revival values. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RubyTear.NAME: Ruby Tear
${ModID}:RubyTear.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Revival !${ModID}:r!. NL When the Revival value of this card hits 0, its costs are free for the combat
${ModID}:RubyTear.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Deal !D! damage. NL  ${ModID}:Revival !${ModID}:r!. ${ModID}:Revival !${ModID}:r2!. NL When any Revival value of this card hits 0, its costs are free for the combat

${ModID}:FountainOfYouth.NAME: Fountain Of Youth
${ModID}:FountainOfYouth.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Revival !${ModID}:r!. NL ${ModID}:Removed : remove all removable Curses from your deck.
${ModID}:FountainOfYouth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Revival !${ModID}:r!. NL ${ModID}:Revival !${ModID}:r2!. NL ${ModID}:Removed : remove all removable Curses from your deck.

${ModID}:OneToOne.NAME: One To One
${ModID}:OneToOne.DESCRIPTION: Take damage from enemy attacks only.

${ModID}:BloodLetting.NAME: Blood-letting
${ModID}:BloodLetting.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Max HP everytime you lose HP until your next turn. NL Exhaust.
